note.p: Birth: St Petersburg, Russia (18 February or 02 March 1862
Death: Petrograd (St Petersburg), Russia (16 or 17 May 1916)
Authority: The Altnames are as given in, respectively, Proc RS A XCIV (1918) and BR
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1917-1918 vol 94 pp xxv-xxxi signed by A S and G W W
Notes: DSB gives dates of birth and death as 02 March 1862 - 16 May 1916
